TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContractReference extends System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference

summary.span: 表示发现文档中对服务说明的引用。

span.span: Represents a reference in a discovery document to a service description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML Web services 发现涉及到给定的 URL 查找可用的 Web 服务。XML Web services discovery involves discovering the available Web Services given an URL. URL 通常指向发现文档，该文档通常具有 .disco 文件扩展名。The URL usually points to a discovery document, which typically has a.disco file name extension. 在发现文档中，引用有关 XML Web services 是否存在的信息。Within a discovery document are references to information about the existence of XML Web services. 这些引用可以引用服务说明、XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构或其他发现文档。These references can refer to service descriptions, XML Schema Definition language (XSD) schemas or other discovery documents. 此类表示对服务说明的引用。This class represents a reference to a Service Description. 在发现文档中，对服务说明的引用包含在 `contractRef` XML 元素中。Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element. `contractRef`XML 元素有两个属性： `ref` 和 `docRef` 。The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes: `ref` and `docRef`. `contractRef`元素必须具有与常量匹配的 XML 命名空间 ，而 `ref` 和属性则 `docRef` 放置在 和属性中 。The `contractRef` element must have an XML namespace matching the constant, whereas the `ref` and `docRef` attributes are placed in the and properties. ## Examples [!code-cpp[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/CPP/contractreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/CS/contractreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ContractReference#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ContractReference/VB/contractreference.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在发现文档中，对服务说明的引用包含在 `contractRef` XML 元素中。Within a discovery document, a reference to a Service Description is contained within a `contractRef` XML element. `contractRef`XML 元素包含下表中所述的两个属性。The `contractRef` XML element has two attributes described in the following table. |AttributeAttribute|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |refref|服务说明的 URL。The URL for the service description. 属性表示属性的值 `ref` 。The property represents the value of the `ref` attribute.| |docRefdocRef|实现由特性指定的服务说明的 XML Web service 的 URL `ref` 。The URL for a XML Web service implementing the service description specified by the `ref` attribute. 属性表示属性的值 `docRef` 。The property represents the value of the `docRef` attribute.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置的 属性 。The following code example sets the property of .
